item.title: Mobile App Privacy Policy
item.description: Mobile App Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy ONLINE ORDERING SERVICE applies to all personal information submitted by Users on the ONLINE ORDERING SERVICE or emailed to ENZ and/or any Cafe, and any information that may be automatically retrieved through the services that a Vendor offers on the ONLINE ORDERING SERVICE.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.description: Terms of Service By signing up for the Extraorder services (Services) or any of the services offered by Extraorder Limited (Extraorder) you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions set out below (Terms of Service).
If customers haven’t already installed the mobile app, they can find it by scanning any Extraorder table/location QR code, or searching “Extraorder” on their devices’ app store.
